ygData.subject: Stealth improvements
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone else noticed that since the last patch that click-targetting has gotten a lot better?  I can now MUCH more easy target a player or mob that is
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone else noticed that since the last patch that click-targetting has
gotten a lot better? I can now MUCH more easy target a player or mob that is
partially obstructed by another player or mob. I used to have to just run
around the mob in front to target the one behind. If you haven't noticed yet,
try targetting different people that are close together like at a city or
outside a zone healing/medding. For ME anyhow, it's working much better.

Crier Sharpsong - 25th song bard on Fennin Ro

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/
